name: babelrc-rollup
description: Builds a babel configuration for rollup-plugin-babel by reading .babelrc.

scripts.test: npm run flow && npm run bootstrap
scripts.bootstrap: babel src/index.js --no-babelrc --plugins syntax-flow,transform-flow-strip-types,transform-es2015-parameters -o dist/babelrc-rollup.m.js && rollup -c rollup.es.config.js && npm run build

author: Brian Donovan <me@brian-donovan.com>
